name: Paranomaly
description:
Anomalies are occurring in your house. Objects might appear, disappear, move, or change. Report anomalies to fix them, and try to survive for as long as possible. Memorize the scene, observe closely, and report any anomalies you find. How long can you survive for?

This game was made in 72 hours (3 days) for Ludum Dare.

The models in this game came from the VNB Home Set.
